price: ߓߘߎ ߓߊ߯ ߣߊ߬ ߝߍ߫ ߸ ߏ߬ ߟߋ ߦߋ߫ ߞߐ߲߬ߞߐ߲߬ߒߡߊ ߟߏ߲ ߘߌ߫ ߛߊ߫
arabic: وَنُفِخَ فِي ٱلصُّورِۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوۡمُ ٱلۡوَعِيدِ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wanufikha fī al-ṣūri dhālika yawmu al-waʿīdi
